quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Unknown

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Never, never, never give up.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Don't think, just do.
author: Horace

quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
author: Og Mandino

quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
author: Philip Sidney

quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
author: George Lucas

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: Be Impeccable With Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
author: George S. Patton

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
author: Confucius

quote: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
author: John Dewey

quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
author: Michael Korda

quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: Never give in and never give up.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
author: Ted Turner

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
author: Dan Millman

quote: If you think you can do it, you can.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Never complain and never explain.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than You, and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
author: Judy Collins

quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.
author: Carl von Clausewitz

quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But... the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: It's always too early to quit.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: You have to make it happen.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
author: George Herbert

quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
author: Unknown

quote: After a storm comes a calm.
author: Matthew Henry

quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
author: Ken Venturi

quote: Step by step and the thing is done.
author: Charles Atlas

quote: The more things you do, the more you can do.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
author: Pauline Kael

quote: Who seeks shall find.
author: Sophocles

quote: You will never win if you never begin.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Caine

quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.
author: Stevie Wonder

quote: To begin, begin.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.
author: Shakti Gawain

quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
author: Richard Rorty

quote: We need to accept that the commandments of God aren't just a long list of good ideas. They aren't 'life hacks' from an Internet blog or motivational quotes from a Pinterest board.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.
author: George C. Marshall

quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: Wherever you are - be all there.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
author: H. L. Hunt

quote: Deserve your dream.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: Either move or be moved.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
author: Virgil

quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
author: Sophocles

quote: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
author: John Burroughs

quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
author: Philip Emeagwali

quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
author: George Whitefield

quote: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: Only the educated are free.
author: Epictetus

quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I come to win.
author: Leo Durocher

quote: When one must, one can.
author: Charlotte Whitton

quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
author: Victor Kiam

quote: One finds limits by pushing them.
author: Herbert Simon

quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
author: Eileen Caddy

quote: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune.
author: Tecumseh

quote: I can, therefore I am.
author: Simone Weil

quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Hitch your wagon to a star.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You never know what motivates you.
author: Cicely Tyson

quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.
author: John Donne

quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
author: Golda Meir

quote: He conquers who endures.
author: Persius

quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.
author: Lauren Bacall

quote: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
author: John Burroughs

quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.
author: Herman Cain

quote: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: The turning point was when I hit my 30th birthday. I thought, if really want to write, it's time to start. I picked up the book How to Write a Novel in 90 Days. The author said to just write three pages a day, and I figured, I can do this. I never got past Page 3 of that book.
author: James Rollins

quote: Give Obama a script he has made his own, and he is the motivational speaker to end all speakers. Tony Robbins cloned with Honest Abe.
author: Tina Brown

quote: God always strives together with those who strive.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Know or listen to those who know.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
author: Diane Sawyer

quote: A will finds a way.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances. Be more active. Show up more often.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done if we are always doing.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The more we do, the more we can do.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
author: Natalie Gulbis

quote: Always continue the climb. It is possible for you to do whatever you choose, if you first get to know who you are and are willing to work with a power that is greater than ourselves to do it.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: Many are called but few get up.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: My first book was called, 'Mountain, Get Out of My Way,' where I did an autobiographical sketch, if you will, looking back at myself and looking back at things in my life, and juxtaposing them against things that are happening in other people's lives and trying to be motivational.
author: Montel Williams

quote: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me.
author: Jerry West

quote: I believe that any type of education can be great, but an education about ourselves can create something wonderful. I am a comedian, but people have called me a motivational speaker. I don't really consider myself that at all.
author: Andy Andrews

quote: As long as I'm not selling out the people that ride or die with me, I'm glad I'm not an MC. I'm a motivational speaker. I'm not that rapper dude.
author: Young Jeezy

quote: Marvin's Motivational Moments actually started as something that was actually therapeutic for me. I would sit up late at night after my wife passed trying to adjust to being alone.
author: Marvin Sapp

quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
author: William James

quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: There is always room at the top.
author: Daniel Webster

quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Do whatever you do intensely.
author: Robert Henri

quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I like to put on hardcore when I have to clean my apartment, which I hate to do, but it's motivational. I like old heavy metal when I'm outside working on my car. Music has definite functions for me.
author: Peter Steele

quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
author: Marianne Vos

quote: I started doing motivational tours. I've seen all kinds of people, from the CEOs to the lowest executive, opening up to their fears. We don't introspect as much as we should.
author: Anupam Kher

quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
author: Sylvia Browne

quote: I went to a motivational training course once, a course of self-discovery, and I found out after a week that my fear - it was not a fear of not being accepted - was a very violent fear of failure.
author: Emanuel Steward

quote: I was perceived to be a first- to third-rounder. I kind of had a tough junior year and fell to the fifth round. At that time, it was motivational.
author: Ryan Howard

quote: I've a great family, two children to take care of. Then, of course, I do commentary for TV. I do speak about various women's issues around the world - like LGBT, motivational speeches. I have a lot on my plate right now. But eventually, yes, I would like to pass on the knowledge and something that I would like to do.
author: Martina Navratilova

quote: Religious speech is extreme, emotional, and motivational. It is anti-literal, relying on metaphor, allusion, and other rhetorical devices, and it assumes knowledge within a community of believers.
author: Amy Waldman

quote: My dad is too cute. Every morning, he sends me one motivational quote. I have a folder full of all his quotes.
author: Alia Bhatt

quote: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.
author: Woody Hayes

quote: One day, I got so disgusted that I sat down and wrote a list called 'Justin's list of things to do before he kicks the bucket.' I wrote it for myself and shortened it to 'Justin's Bucket List.' It was there on the wall, not as a story idea but as a motivational tool for myself, which actually ended up working pretty well.
author: Justin Zackham

quote: I've always thought of acting as more of an exercise in empathy, which is not to be confused with sympathy. You're trying to get inside a certain emotional reality or motivational reality and try to figure out what that's about so you can represent it.
author: Edward Norton

quote: I don't know what it's like to have a typical father figure. He's not the dad who's going to take me to the beach and go swimming, but he's such a motivational person.
author: Tiffany Trump

quote: I want to build a legacy at the WWE, but I definitely want to continue to grow the Bella Empire. I want it to go beyond the ring. I would love to be a motivational speaker.
author: Nikki Bella

quote: I realized I love motivating and I love empowering and I love inspiring people. I did that as an athlete for 18 years, and I am able to do that as a motivational speaker now as well as doing work on television.
author: Dominique Dawes

quote: I'm going to write a book, continue acting, continue motivational speaking and just share with people who I am and what I've learned in my second chance of life and pass it on to people in their first chance of life.
author: J. R. Martinez

quote: I'm thrilled to continue my partnership with U by Kotex for Generation Know while helping to empower girls. I've always been a motivational resource for my younger sisters and hope I can positively impact and inspire other young girls too.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: People always accuse me of being motivational in a way, like it was a bad thing, but that's just how I was raised. My mom raised me in a positive environment, with lots of love in my heart, and that reflects in my music.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: Our subliminal mental processes operate outside awareness because they arise in these portions of our mind that are inaccessible to our conscious self; their inaccessibility is due to the architecture of the brain rather than because they have been subject to Freudian motivational forces like repression.
author: Leonard Mlodinow

quote: Oh, I would love to be a motivational speaker. I have pulled myself out of a million potholes, and I can see the potholes ahead of me. That doesn't mean that I could always do that so perfectly for my own life. I totally fall in potholes.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
author: Keke Palmer

quote: Typically, if you reward something, you get more of it. You punish something, you get less of it. And our businesses have been built for the last 150 years very much on that kind of motivational scheme.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: I like motivational books, because I like the go-getting American spirit - your destiny is in your own hands, life is what you make it, don't accept your limitations, jump before you're pushed, leap before you look.
author: Louise Mensch

quote: I'm a motivational speaker.
author: Young Jeezy

quote: I have given motivational speeches at IIT and other well-known establishments. I want to appeal to the people, and therefore, I talk from the heart.
author: Sangram Singh

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love.
